name: Coffee Crisis (itch) (Outfrost, marekdomagala_composer, 666Savior, CJ Gladback, Kiskadee)
name_original: Coffee Crisis (itch) (Outfrost, marekdomagala_composer, 666Savior, CJ Gladback, Kiskadee)
description:
Your shift has begun and the air conditioner is broken. Can you serve your customers while staying cool to keep your cool?

Accept orders from customers, prepare their beverages, serve, and hopefully satisfy their demands. You’ll need to manage your cool, so that you don’t break down before the end of your day. Some customers will be more picky than others!

A Ludum Dare 49 game by
  • CJGladback (itch.io) (instagram) (twitch) - art, animation
  • 666Savior (Ryan White) (itch.io) (twitch) - art, animation, writing
  • Marek Domagała (itch.io) (youtube) - music, sound design
  • Kiskadee (itch.io) - programming
  • L1Q (itch.io) - programming
  • outfrost (Iwo Bujkiewicz) (itch.io) (twitch) - programming, producing, visual tuning
  • Alex Tengu (itch.io) (twitter) - additional assets

Sound samples by HonestDan and freesound.org users: GowlerMusic, jameswrowles, TheGloomWorker, vdm.r.

Ludum Dare submission page
The jam theme was "Unstable".
